comment: Very nice professor. I had him online but he cared about his students and enjoys stats. I dont like stats so I found it hard, but he made it doable thats for sure.
Take him if you can! Gave me extensions whenever I needed them and always curved exams. Super understanding.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Woo is very helpful and responds quickly to emails. He is also very understanding and clearly cares about his student's success, offering extra credit and/or curving upgrades depending on the class average. As someone who struggles with math, I am extremely grateful to have had him as a professor, as he made the class much less stressful!
He provides lots of help prior to homework and exam due dates.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Woo is an excellent instructor. His notes are clear and concise. He makes sure to explain everything so you can understand and is always open to questions. He is quick to respond to emails and offers help with homework assignments. I highly recommend Professor Woo, he is one of the best professors I've had.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring
